title: Languages of India
author: wheream_i
pages:
There are 22 official
languages in India in
addition to 122 major
languages and 1599
other languages.

The most spoken is
Hindi/Urdu, the 3rd
most-spoken language
in the world. The
former is mostly
spoken in India while
the latter in Pakistan.
Hindi and Urdu are
basically mutually
intelligible when
spoken, meaning Hindi
and Urdu speakers
can generally
understand each
other when speaking
save for some
different words. Hindi
is written in
Devanagari script
           while Urdu
is written in the
Perso-Arabic script
 .    











I'm running out of time
here but basically
India has a ton of
languages and
cultural diversity and
I think that's pretty
cool.

-wheream_i
